10  xz1(0.0),

21  void HP1_DCBlock::reset(double _sample_rate)
22  {
23  xz1 = 0.0;
24  yz1 = 0.0;
25 
26  sample_rate = _sample_rate;
27 
28  const double wc = 0.0015 * 44100.0 / sample_rate;
29  a = 1.0 - wc / 2.0;
30  b = 1.0 - wc;
31  }
32 
33  double HP1_DCBlock::process(double x)
34  {
35  const double y = a * (x - xz1) + b * yz1;
36  xz1 = x;
37  yz1 = y;
38 
39  return y;
40  }
